name: NFL Experience Toronto
description:
Bringing you the ultimate gameday experience to Toronto! Dive into the ultimate football fan zone with a full day of action, entertainment, and giveaways.

Get up close with the Vince Lombardi Trophy, explore interactive games like the Madden Gaming Experience, Cornhole, Vertical Leap, Reaction Challenge and more. Get access to exclusive, officially licensed NFL Lifestyle merchandise and fuel up with delicious local eats and enjoy free samples from King's Hawaiian.

Enjoy a special appearance from the Detroit Lion's Chee!
